subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In her first match since winning the United States Open in September, Serena Williams defeated Angelique Kerber, 6-4, 6-1, to start round-robin play in the WTA Championships in Istanbul.
snippet: In her first match since winning the United States Open in September, Serena Williams defeated Angelique Kerber, 6-4, 6-1, to start round-robin play in the WTA Championships in Istanbul.
